definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
Sun Jihai (1977-), Chinese footballer, played for Manchester City (2002-2008)
to succeed sb in a job/successor
night and day (idiom); continuous strenuous effort
adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son)/to inherit
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages

sentences.english: Mr. Smith was succeeded by Mrs. Jones as treasurer.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯夫人继史密斯先生任会计。

sentences.english: Nan Song Dynasty is an important period in development of suites of poems on history after Wan Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南宋是继晚唐之后咏史组诗发展的又一重要时期。

sentences.english: They are the hieroglyphics of feudalism succeeding those of theocracy .
sentences.chinese: 这是继神权政治象形文字之后的封建制度象形文字。

sentences.english: Weeping, Cinderella left the room with her stepsisters' wicked laughter behind her.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘哭着离开房间，背后传来她继姐妹邪恶的笑声。

sentences.english: This is a Greek word that simply means the successors.
sentences.chinese: 这是个希腊语，意思就是继业者。

sentences.english: Her stepmother and stepsisters were very horrid to Cinderella.
sentences.chinese: 她的继母和继姐妹对灰姑娘非常憎恶。

sentences.english: After security, food and water make up the second link of the chain.
sentences.chinese: 继安全之后，粮食与水构成生存之链的第二环。

sentences.english: Article 21. Maltreatment and discrimination shall not be allowed between step-parents and step-children.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一条继父母与继子女间，不得虐待或歧视。

sentences.english: Article 21. Maltreatment and discrimination shall not be allowed between step-parents and step-children.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一条继父母与继子女间，不得虐待或歧视。

sentences.english: This is their second Serie A coup, having already snapped up Roma veteran Tommasi earlier in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 这是列万特的继罗马老枪托马西之后的又一收获。

sentences.english: After the Persians it was Alexander the Great's turn.
sentences.chinese: 继波斯帝国之后，阿富汗的统治者是亚历山大大帝。

sentences.english: So, in lieu of books, the new trend seems to be banning fat.
sentences.chinese: 于是，继禁书之后，新的趋势似乎是要禁脂肪。

sentences.english: Returns the type or member identified by the specified metadata token.
sentences.chinese: 传回指定之中继资料语汇基元所识别的型别或成员。

sentences.english: I also felt the need to speak out about the detrimental effect I felt my step-parents had had on my life.
sentences.chinese: 我还感到需要诉说自己一生中对继父母所造成的伤害。

sentences.english: Shaoxing opera genres are a typical character of the most distinctive local drama besides Peking opera.
sentences.chinese: 越剧流派是继京剧之后最具特色的一个地方剧种。

sentences.english: Lovebirds Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez may be planning a duet.
sentences.chinese: 继情侣贾斯汀毕伯，戈麦斯可能策划二重唱。

definition: (Internet slang) time after time/again and again and again
(of a list, music chart etc) to reach the top
to take the lead/to show initiative
